ndarray/tables/Row.hpp

00001 #ifndef NDARRAY_TABLES_Row_hpp_INCLUDED
00002 #define NDARRAY_TABLES_Row_hpp_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include "ndarray.hpp"
00005 #include "ndarray/tables/Layout.hpp"
00006 #include "ndarray/tables/detail/Columns.hpp"
00007 
00008 namespace ndarray { namespace tables {
00009 
00010 template <typename T>
00011 class Row {
00012     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Columns_ Columns_;
00013     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::ColumnsPtr ColumnsPtr;
00014 public:
00015 
00016     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Layout_ Layout_;
00017     typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::Raw Raw;
00018 
00019 
00021     template <int N>
00022     struct At {
00023         typedef typename detail::TraitsAccess<T>::template Fields<N>::Qualified::RowValue Type;
00024     };
00025 
00027     template <int N>
00028     typename At<N>::Type operator[](Index<N> index) const { return (*_columns)[index][_n]; }
00029 
00031     Layout_ const & getLayout() const { return _columns->getLayout(); }
00032 
00034     Row(Row const & other) : _n(other._n), _columns(other._columns) {}
00035 
00037     Row & operator=(Row const & other) {
00038         if (&other != this) {
00039             _n = other._n;
00040             _columns = other._columns;
00041         }
00042         return *this;
00043     }
00044 
00046     template <typename U>
00047     Row(Row<U> const & other, typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_same<U const,T> >::type* e = 0) :
00048         _n(other._n), _columns(other._columns)
00049     {}
00050 
00052     template <typename U>
00053     typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_same<U const,T>, Row & >::type
00054     operator=(Row<U> const & other) {
00055         _n = other._n;
00056         _columns = other._columns;
00057         return *this;
00058     }
00059 
00061     static Row allocate(Layout_ const & layout) {
00062         Layout_ normal_layout(layout);
00063         normal_layout.normalize();
00064         std::pair<Manager::Ptr,Raw*> p = SimpleManager<Raw>::allocate(normal_layout.getBytes());
00065         ColumnsPtr columns = Columns_::create(1, -1, p.second, p.first, normal_layout);
00066         return Row(0, columns);
00067     }
00068 
00069 protected:
00070 
00071     Row() : _n(-1), _columns() {}
00072 
00073     Row(int n, ColumnsPtr const & columns) : _n(n), _columns(columns) {}
00074 
00075 private:
00076 
00077     template <typename U> friend class Table;
00078     template <typename U> friend class Row;
00079     template <typename U> friend class detail::Iterator;
00080 
00081     int _n;
00082     ColumnsPtr _columns;
00083 };
00084 
00085 }} // namespace ndarray::tables
